title: Daydream
lyrics:
Nae yeop-e neowa
Haes-sal-e nog-a
Jam-eseo kkael ttaen
Igos-e neowa
Hyeonsil-eul beos-eona

You got me daydreaming to dawn



Haneul malg-eun nal geunal neowa

Out at the park

Riding a bike

There’s no need to hide

Haneul-eul dalm-eun neol

Pum-e angoseo

Sipping a wine

Let’s stay through the night



Chang-ga-e anj-a

Neoleul gamanhi boda nun-eul gam-eumyeon

Naegen deoug seonmyeonghae neowa geulin maeil-i

Girl you got me daydreaming to dawn



Haneul malg-eun nal geunal neowa

Out at the park

Riding a bike

There’s no need to hide

Haneul-eul dalm-eun neol

Pum-e angoseo

Sipping a wine

Let’s stay through the night



Laying down on you

Whispering to you

Daydreaming with you

Igniting this dawn

Neowa hamkke isungan
